articles.title: Secretary of C.C., WPK Meets New Syrian Ambassador
articles.content:
Secretary of C.C., WPK Meets New Syrian Ambassador
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, met and had a talk with Tammam Sulaiman, newly appointed ambassador of Syria to the DPRK, who paid a courtesy call on him on Tuesday.

articles.title: Mauritanian PM Wishes Korean People Greater Success
articles.content:
Mauritanian PM Wishes Korean People Greater Success 
						
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- Choe Hyok Chol, DPRK ambassador to Mauritania, paid a courtesy call on Yahya Ould Hademine, prime minister of Mauritania, on April 1.
					 At the meeting the prime minister said that he really admires the social system and policy of the DPRK in which the people have become master of everything and everything serves them.
					
					 He sincerely wished the friendly Korean people greater successes in their just struggle for attaining their noble goal under the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Mauritanian Personage Supports Korean People's Struggle
articles.content:
Mauritanian Personage Supports Korean People's Struggle
						
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- Choe Hyok Chol, DPRK ambassador to Mauritania, paid a courtesy call on Sidi Mohamed Ould Maham, president of the Union Party for the Republic (UPR) of Mauritania, on April 1.
					 At the meeting the president said that the friendly and cooperative relations between Mauritania and the DPRK have long history.
					
					 He still remembers the day when he attended the event welcoming President Kim Il Sung on his visit to Mauritania in 1975, the chairperson said, adding:
					
					 The UPR will always support the friendly Korean people in their struggle to achieve the country's reunification and build an independent and prospering powerful country.

articles.title: Mongolian Ambassador Hosts Reception
articles.content:
Mongolian Ambassador Hosts Reception 
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- Manibadrakh Ganbold, Mongolian ambassador to the DPRK, gave a reception Tuesday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					 Present there on invitation were Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong and officials of the Foreign Ministry.
					
					 The ambassador said in his speech that the Korean people are significantly celebrating the Day of the Sun, their greatest national holiday.
					
					 He said that he was rejoiced over the great successes made by the Korean people in their efforts to achieve the prosperity of the country and improve their living standard under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 He extended sincere thanks to respected Kim Jong Un for paying deep attention to the development of the Mongolia-DPRK relations.
					
					 Ri Su Yong recalled that Kim Il Sung founded the Juche idea and leader Kim Jong Il turned the DPRK into a powerful socialist state independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence and into an invincible political and military power.
					
					 Thanks to the solid foundation of friendship Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il provided together with the preceding leaders of Mongolia, the bilateral relations have invariably grown stronger, he said.
					
					 He said the DPRK would make positive efforts to develop the bilateral relations of cooperation onto a new higher stage.

articles.title: National Photo Exhibition Opens
articles.content:
National Photo Exhibition Opens
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- The national photo exhibition "Father of People" was opened with due ceremony at the People's Palace of Culture on Tuesday to celebrate the third anniversary of the election of Marshal Kim Jong Un to the top post of the Workers' Party of Korea and the state. 
					 On display at the venue of the exhibition are photos showing the noble personality of Kim Jong Un as a great man. 
					
					 Photos such as "Respected Supreme Commander Comrade Kim Jong Un inspecting the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division of the Korean People's Army" and "Respected Supreme Commander Comrade Kim Jong Un having photo session with service personnel standing guard over Panmunjom" show the patriotic devotion made by him to firmly defend the sovereignty of the country and the dignity of the nation while making ceaseless long journeys of Songun. 
					
					 Photos of Kim Jong Un going round apartment houses for educators of Kim Chaek University of Technology and learning in detail about safety and convenience of ski lift at Masikryong Ski Resort by riding it up to the top show the popular traits of the Marshal who is carrying forward President Kim Il Sung's and leader Kim Jong Il's noble intention of believing in the people as in Heaven. 
					
					 There are also photos dealing with the happy life of the service personnel and people of the DPRK and the true picture of the country making a leap forward full of dynamism. 
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned and Pyongyangites.
					
					 Minister of Culture Pak Chun Nam made an opening address.

articles.title: Seminar Held by Officials, Members of GFTUK
articles.content:
Seminar Held by Officials, Members of GFTUK
						
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- A seminar on the Songun revolutionary leadership feats of leader Kim Jong Il was held by officials and members of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea (GFTUK) at the Central Hall of Workers on Tuesday on the occasion of the 22nd anniversary of his election as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					 Speakers said that he defended the socialist country of Juche with his original Songun politics and performed great feats for the times and revolution, the country and its people.
					
					 Under his leadership the People's Army has grown to be vanguard regarding it as its life and soul to devotedly protect the leader and thoroughly implement the order of the Supreme Commander in the van, the powerful Paektusan revolutionary army equipped with modern weaponry and the main force for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Songun, they noted.
					
					 Kim Jong Il made sure that Kim Il Sung Constitution which codifies President Kim Il Sung's Juche-based idea of nation-building and feats was adopted, established the Korean-style state leadership system with the National Defence Commission as a pivot, thus winning victories in the struggle to defend socialism and in the confrontation with imperialism and the U.S., they said.
					
					 They underlined the need to make a positive contribution to hastening the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, regarding the behests of Kim Jong Il as the lifeline.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Election as NDC Chairman Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Election as NDC Chairman Marked
						
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- A meeting of officials and members of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea (DWUK) to hear impressions of leader Kim Jong Il's virtues took place at the Hall of Women Tuesday to mark the 22nd anniversary of his election as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					 Present there were Choe Ryong Hae, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Jong Sun, chairwoman of the Central Committee of the DWUK, and officials of the women's union and its members in the city.
					
					 Speakers said that Kim Jong Il's election as NDC chairman was a historic event of great significance in victoriously advancing the revolutionary cause of Juche and the revolutionary cause of Songun that started on Mt. Paektu and building a thriving nation.
					
					 They added:
					
					 Kim Jong Il's inspection of the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division of the Korean People's Army on August 25, Juche 49 (1960) was a declaration of his iron faith and will to steadily carry forward the precious traditions of the Korean revolution pioneered and advanced by arms, and a declaration of history that proclaimed the start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 Ceaselessly visiting units of the Korean People's Army, factories and enterprises in various fields of the national economy and co-op farms, Kim Jong Il worked heart and soul to increase the defence capabilities of the country and build a thriving nation.
					
					 The revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK are fully demonstrating their might as the powerful Paektusan revolutionary army as they are holding Marshal Kim Jong Un, who is identical to Kim Jong Il, in high esteem at the top post of the party, state and army.

articles.title: Agricultural Workers Gather for Poem Reciting, Singing
articles.content:
Agricultural Workers Gather for Poem Reciting, Singing 
						
 Sariwon, April 7 (KCNA) -- A meeting of agricultural workers for poem reciting and singing "Songun Brilliant Commander and Cooperative Fields under Socialism" took place at the Migok Cooperative Farm in Sariwon City, North Hwanghae Province, on Tuesday on the occasion of the 22nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					 Present there were Ri Myong Gil, chairman of the C.C., the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea, officials concerned and agricultural workers in the city and at the farm.
					
					 Through poem and chorus "Might of Korea" and narration and singing in unison to the accompaniment of Janggo "This Is Thanks to the Songun Politics of General" and other numbers the performers eulogized the brilliant career of the great revolutionary and peerless patriot who performed the undying feats for the times and revolution with his outstanding idea and gigantic revolutionary practice for a long period.
					
					 The numbers also included serial songs "Sea of Apples at Foot of Chol Pass", male solo "Our Marshal" and poems and choruses "Forward to the Final Victory" and "We Will Defend General Kim Jong Un at the Cost of Our Lives".

articles.title: Foreign Crewmen Meet
articles.content:
Foreign Crewmen Meet
						
 Chongjin, April 7 (KCNA) -- There took place a meeting of foreign crewmen at Chongjin Port Tuesday to mark the 22nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK. 
					 The participants laid bouquets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in Chongjin City and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Present there were the captain and crewmen of the Sierra Leone-flagged ship YUAN-7.
					
					 The speakers said Kim Jong Il made unremitting efforts till the last moments of his life to bolster up the defence capabilities of the DPRK. 
					
					 He, regarding the military affairs as the most important state affairs for a long period, turned the DPRK into a full-fledged nuclear weapons state and satellite manufacturer and launcher, they said.
					
					 Thanks to his political ability, brilliant military wisdom, matchless grit and leadership art, the DPRK could rank itself among the world military powers. The great feats he performed before the era and history will be immortal, they added.
					
					 A letter to Marshal Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: World Health Day Marked
articles.content:
World Health Day Marked 
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place at the People's Palace of Culture on Tuesday to mark World Health Day. 
					 Present there were officials in the field of public health, ministries and national institutions, public organizations and media, the representative of the WHO here and staff members of missions of different international organizations, foreign diplomatic envoys and embassy officials here. 
					
					 Speakers at the meeting referred to the fact that this year WHO proposed the issue of food safety as its theme to provide an occasion of preventing diseases from food and improving healthcare for people. 
					
					 They stressed the need to intensify information service to imbue people with common knowledge on hygiene regarding production and preservation of food and its consumption so they may not suffer diseases. 
					
					 The participants watched a video on safe food before looking around foodstuffs on display. 
					
					 Hygienic information services took place in every province on the occasion of World Health Day.

articles.title: Film Show Marks Anniversary of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il's Visit to Indonesia
articles.content:
Film Show Marks Anniversary of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il's Visit to Indonesia
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- A film show took place at the Taedongmun Cinema Tuesday to mark the 50th anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's and leader Kim Jong Il's visit to Indonesia.
					 Present there were Kim Jong Suk, chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, So Ho Won, vice-chairman of the committee who doubles as chairman of the DPRK-Indonesia Friendship Association, officials concerned, people in the city, Indonesian Ambassador to the DPRK Bambang Hiendrasto and his embassy officials.
					
					 Foreign diplomatic envoys and embassy officials here were also present on invitation.
					
					 The speakers said that Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's visit to Indonesia served as a historic occasion that provided a firm cornerstone of the development of the bilateral relations.
					
					 During the visit, President Sukarno named the beautiful and rare flower Kimilsungia, they noted, adding: The film show will offer the participants an opportunity of knowing better about the undying feats the great leaders of the DPRK performed by accomplishing the human cause of independence.
					
					 They expressed their will to expand and develop the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Indonesia provided by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and Sukarno in various fields.
					
					 The participants watched the DPRK documentary film "The great leader Comrade Kim Il Sung meets with foreign heads of state and prominent personages" Part 1.

articles.title: University Graduates Volunteer to Work at Schools on Remote Islets, Mountain Villages
articles.content:
University Graduates Volunteer to Work at Schools on Remote Islets, Mountain Villages 
						
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- Many university graduates across the DPRK have volunteered to work at schools in remote areas.
					 Over the past decade more than 800 university graduates volunteered to teach children on islets in forefront areas and in remote villages in mountains.
					
					 A number of university graduates volunteered to work at those schools this year, too.
					
					 Among them were graduates from Ri Su Dok Wonsan Teacher Training College, Wonsan University of Education, Kim Jong Suk University of Education, O Jung Hup Chongjin University of Education No. 1, Kanggye University of Education No. 1, Kim Jong Thae Haeju University of Education No. 1 and Jo Ok Hui Haeju Teacher Training College. The number of volunteers is on the steady increase.

articles.title: Coal Output Increases in DPRK
articles.content:
Coal Output Increases in DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- Coal output is increasing at collieries in the western area of the DPRK.
					 Those coal mines have raised their production by two percent in recent three months as compared with the same period of last year.
					
					 In the period, the Pukchang Area Coal-mining Complex increased its coal output by 27 percent while the Sunchon Area Youth Coal-mining Complex by 12 percent.
					
					 The Tokchon Area Coal-mining Complex produced 1 000 more tons a day.
					
					 Besides, Hyongbong, Sochang, Jenam and Namyang coal mines have carried out their daily quota at 110 percent.

articles.title: Various Kinds of Measuring Instruments Developed
articles.content:
Various Kinds of Measuring Instruments Developed 
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- Various kinds of measuring instruments for farming have been developed by Agricultural College of Phyongbuk University in the DPRK.
					 Among them are meters for surveying soil acidity, water contents in crops, intensity of solar rays and soil temperature.
					
					 Those measuring instruments have been applied to many co-op farms, proving highly practical not only in the field of agriculture but in the fields of forestry management and food administration.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Praises Kim Il Sung's Feats Performed for Unity of Anti-imperialist Independent Forces
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Praises Kim Il Sung's Feats Performed for Unity of Anti-imperialist Independent Forces 
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung regarded the issue of unity of anti-imperialist independent forces as a vital requirement for carving out the destiny of the cause of global independence and made overall clarification of all problems arising in settling it, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in an article. 
					 The slogan "Let the world people advocating independence unite!" put up by the President clearly indicates the main principles and tasks for achieving the unity of the anti-imperialist independent forces and ways to do so, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The President performed great exploits in strengthening the unity of the world people advocating independence by wisely leading the Workers' Party of Korea and the government of the DPRK to firmly adhere to the foreign policy tenet--independence, peace and friendship--and fully implement it. 
					
					 The President visited many foreign countries, encouraging the world people in their struggle for independence and thereby performing undying exploits for strengthening unity and might of the anti-imperialist independent forces. 
					
					 His precious instruction to counter by dint of the strategy of unity the imperialist reactionaries' moves to split and alienate the world people and their strategy of destroying those forces one by one is the immutable truth which the world progressives should regard as important guidelines in the whole course of the struggle for accomplishing the cause of global independence and it is their historical task to achieve unity. 
					
					 The Korean people will as ever take the lead in the struggle for defending socialism under the uplifted banner of anti-imperialist struggle and thus powerfully encourage the world people in their struggle and make a positive contribution to the accomplishment of the cause of global independence.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Terms S. Korea Miserable Colonial Servant of U.S.
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Terms S. Korea Miserable Colonial Servant of U.S. 
						
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- The United States is an actual ruler of south Korea as it exercises all powers there while its puppet forces are no more than pitiful colonial stooges who consider servility to the U.S. as mode of their existence, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in an article.
					 An independent state should have sovereignty and substantial right to independently map out and enforce its foreign policy. But south Korea has nothing and such things have never been there. 
					
					 The successive rulers from traitor Syngman Rhee to the present chief executive have been engrossed in flunkeyism and servility and they pursued their policies strictly as dictated by their American master.
					
					 More deplorable are policies followed by the present puppet authorities. The same is true of what they have done in the wake of the recent knife attack on the U.S. ambassador and their shameful behavior begging their master to stifle their compatriots in the north, disgustingly flattering him. These silly demeanors only bring shame to the Korean nation and stun the world people.
					
					 These traitors are busy painting south Korea as "an advanced state" and talking about "national status" though they are keen on relying on outside forces and escalating the confrontation with the compatriots in the north, utterly indifferent to the nation's dignity and interests. This cannot be interpreted otherwise than a political cartoon provoking a side-splitting laughter.
					
					 As long as this group of sycophants and quislings are allowed to stay in office, neither can south Korea shake off its disgrace of being a politically less-developed region and colony nor people escape misfortune, pain and a war disaster.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Holds S. Korean Authorities Wholly Accountable for Frozen Inter-Korean Relations
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Holds S. Korean Authorities Wholly Accountable for Frozen Inter-Korean Relations
						
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- Some days ago a spokesperson for the south Korean puppet Ministry of Unification, citing "achievements" one year since the chief executive made public the "Dresden declaration," tried hard to mislead public opinion by claiming that the absence of any dialogue and process to improve the relations between the north and the south is attributable to the "north's refusal to respond to it." Earlier, mandarins of the ministry blustered that the "May 24 step" was taken for the security required for "normal development of the south-north relations".
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes in a commentary in this regard: 
					
					 The litany of rhetoric let loose by the spokesperson to create impression that south Korea has made certain efforts to mend the inter-Korean relations over the past one year since the publication of the ridiculous declaration while advertising its implementation is nothing but profound confusing of the right and wrong. 
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The nonsense talked by the authorities about the "May 24 step" is no more than sheer sophism justifying their acts of pushing the inter-Korean relations to catastrophe. This kind of tongue-lashing only touches off derision of people.
					
					 A wide avenue to improved inter-Korean relations and independent reunification can never be paved as long as the "May 24 step" aimed to totally block dialogue and cooperation between the north and the south remains in force.
					
					 The frozen inter-Korean relations are a natural outcome of the confrontation policy deliberately pursued by the puppet regime in league with outside forces. 
					
					 The reality goes to prove that inter-Korean relations can neither improve nor can the nation escape a nuclear disaster as long as the south Korean authorities persist in their sycophancy towards the U.S. and confrontation of social systems while disregarding the call for achieving peace and reunification by the concerted efforts of the Koreans.
					
					 The clumsy wordplay of the puppet forces to evade the blame for the frozen inter-Korean relations would only bring them shame and stronger criticism from the public at home and abroad.

articles.title: Minju Joson Flails Japan's Moves for Militarization and Reinvasion of Korea
articles.content:
Minju Joson Flails Japan's Moves for Militarization and Reinvasion of Korea
						
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- The Japan space aviation research development organization launched a high-precision military spy satellite by carrier rocket H-2A at the Tanegashima space launching site in Kagoshima Prefecture on March 26. The mission of the satellite is to "gather information" on the DPRK.
					 Earlier, Japan put into service at the maritime "self-defence force" new heli-capable escort craft Izumo with almost the same mission as that of aircraft carrier.
					
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Tuesday says this cannot be construed otherwise than a reckless military action of those obsessed by the wild ambition for militarization and the reinvasion of the Korean peninsula.
					
					 Japan talks such rubbish that the satellite launch and the escort craft deployment are aimed at meeting Japan's interests but it is just a lame excuse to cover up its true colors, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 Under the present regime, in particular, the Japanese reactionaries have become all the more frantic in their moves to become a military giant while revamping all legal and institutional mechanisms standing in the way of overseas invasion. This openly reveals their intention to revenge on the "shame" Japan sustained due to the defeat of its imperialism in the past and realize its old dream of the "Greater East Asia Co-prosperity Sphere".
					
					 The DPRK is the primary target of the Japanese reactionaries' overseas aggression.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries calculate that they cannot realize their ambition for continental invasion without bringing down the DPRK which has emerged an invulnerable fortress of socialism and independence.
					
					 Therefore, they are rushing headlong into militarization after laying a springboard from which to launch aggression overseas by taking the advantage of the U.S. policy for invading the DPRK.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries would be well advised to stop their reckless acts, clearly understanding that their overseas aggression will only lead them to self-destruction.

articles.title: S. Korean Students Protest against Authorities' Unpopular Education Policy
articles.content:
S. Korean Students Protest against Authorities' Unpopular Education Policy
						
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- South Korean students staged an action in Seoul on April 3 in protest against the puppet authorities' policy of estimating university restructuring, according to Voice of People, an internet paper of south Korea.
					 The puppet Ministry of Education confirmed the "basic plan for estimating university restructuring in 2015" in December last year. As a result, hundreds of subjects disappeared and teachers were fired in group.
					
					 Enraged at the puppet authorities' education policy, students staged a demonstration from the Kwanghwamun plaza to the Chonggye plaza.
					
					 Prior to the demonstration, they read out a written protest.
					
					 It denounced the authorities' above-said policy as a pro-business restructuring policy.
					
					 The students let the written protest fly into the "government" building.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Denounces Authorities Using Deployment of THAAD for Their Political Purpose
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Denounces Authorities Using Deployment of THAAD for Their Political Purpose
						
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Voice of People in an editorial denounced the "Saenuri Party" for seeking to introduce THAAD to south Korea on April 2.
					 The editorial accused the "Saenuri Party" of holding a meeting to introduce THAAD on April 1.
					
					 Lurking behind the ruling party's discussion on the deployment of THAAD despite protest of the people from all walks of life is a sinister intention to use it for its political purpose, the editorial said, adding:
					
					 The ruling party's act of echoing the U.S. assertion intended to force the south Korean people to cover the expenses for introducing THAAD is aimed at meeting its interests and the political interests of its American master.

articles.title: Day of Sun Observed Abroad
articles.content:
Day of Sun Observed Abroad
						
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- Events took place in various countries to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) from April 1 to 3.
					 They included meetings, book and photo exhibitions and film shows in Myanmar, Iceland, Romania and Nigeria.
					
					 On display at the venues of the events were photos dealing with exploits performed by the President, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Their works and photos and books introducing the true picture of Songun Korea were also on display.
					
					 Films shown included Korean film "Okryu Children's Hospital."
					
					 Tin Tin Moe, member of the Executive Committee of the Yangon Regional Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar, praised the President as a prominent leader who founded the man-centered Juche idea, liberated Korea, turned the DPRK into a socialist power and performed undying exploits for accomplishing the human cause of independence.
					
					 Jon Arni Halldorsson, general secretary of the Iceland-DPRK Friendship and Cultural Society, said the President actively supported and encouraged the peoples of various countries in their efforts for independence against imperialism and the building of new society, adding the exploits performed by him before the times and humankind would shine forever.
					
					 A Nigerian official said the great idea and exploits of the President are serving as an immortal banner and engine for leading the Korean people to victories.

articles.title: Day of Sun Marked in Romania, Ethiopia
articles.content:
Day of Sun Marked in Romania, Ethiopia
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- Events took place in various countries to celebrate the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) on Mar. 30 and 31.
					 They included a meeting held by the Party for the Socialist Choice of Romania, round-table talks by Ethiopian hospitals and a film show by an Ethiopian enterprise.
					
					 Films shown included Korean film "Fireworks of a Thriving Nation."
					
					 The chairman of the Party for the Socialist Choice of Romania praised the President as the great leader who dedicated himself to the prosperity of the country, happiness of its people and global independence all his life, adding:
					
					 The eye-opening reality of the DPRK would be unthinkable without the exploits of the President who founded the Juche idea and successfully embodied it.
					
					 The Korean people are working world-startling miracles every day despite the desperate moves of the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces to stifle the DPRK at any cost.
					
					 This greatly encourages the world people.

articles.title: Tajik Figure Accuses Japanese Authorities of Their Politically-Motivated Suppression of Chongryon
articles.content:
Tajik Figure Accuses Japanese Authorities of Their Politically-Motivated Suppression of Chongryon
						
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- Sh. Shabdolov, chairman of the Communist Party of Tajikistan, released a statement on April 1 denouncing the Japanese reactionaries for their suppression of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					 The statement said:
					
					 The Japanese authorities hurled many policemen into searching the houses of the chairman and a vice-chairman of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee, a legitimate overseas Koreans' organization, who are deputies to the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, deliberately linking Chongryon with a case of suspicion without any legal validity and scientific evidence.
					
					 As regard the search operation by the Japanese authorities, the legal, media and other circles of Japan are denouncing it as illegal investigation, human rights abuse against Koreans in Japan and national discrimination.
					
					 We vehemently denounce the Japanese authorities for their politically-motivated racket against Chongryon.
					
					 The Japanese authorities should stop at once their hostile policy toward the DPRK and Chongryon.

articles.title: Personage of Int'l Body Calls for Stopping Suppression of Chongryon
articles.content:
Personage of Int'l Body Calls for Stopping Suppression of Chongryon
						
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- E. A. Vidyasekera, coordinating secretary of the Afro-Asian People's Solidarity Organization, issued a statement on April 2 denouncing the Japanese authorities for their brigandish suppression of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					 On March 26 the policemen of the Japan headquarters for joint investigation committed such violence as searching the houses of the chairman and a vice-chairman of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee, he said, and went on:
					
					 The Japanese investigation authorities searched the houses absurdly charging the officials with the violation of the "foreign currency exchange law" but they failed to find any evidence proving it.
					
					 Such outrage against the leading officials of Chongryon Central Standing Committee who are deputies to the Supreme People's Assembly of the dignified DPRK was done in broad daylight in Japan which boasts of being a "law-governed state" and "democratic state", an unpardonable provocation and grave infringement on the sovereignty of the DPRK.
					
					 We bitterly denounce the Japanese authorities' hostile act as human rights abuse.
					
					 If they truly want the improvement of the DPRK-Japan relations, they should immediately stop suppression of Chongryon and the Koreans in Japan.

articles.title: Pakistani, Bangladeshi Organizations Terms Suppression of Chongryon Human Rights Abuse
articles.content:
Pakistani, Bangladeshi Organizations Terms Suppression of Chongryon Human Rights Abuse
						
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- Pakistani and Bangladeshi organizations made public statements on March 31 and April 1 in denunciation of the Japanese authorities for their reckless suppression of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					 The Pakistan Labour Federation said:
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries have perpetrated illegal violence against Chongryon and Koreans in Japan. But it is the first time that they dared to commit such outrageous fascist tyranny against the chairman and a vice-chairman of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee who are deputies to the Supreme People's Assembly of the dignified DPRK.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries can never be allowed to commit mean acts of suppressing Chongryon and pushing the DPRK-Japan relations to a catastrophe.
					
					 We strongly demand the Japanese authorities immediately stop suppression of Chongryon.
					
					 The Bangladesh-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee said:
					
					 The Japanese police raided into the houses of the Chongryon officials with an armored car and many other vehicles to block them off before ransacking them, creating the terror-ridden atmosphere of fascist suppression.
					
					 This is a gangster-like act that lacks legal validity.
					
					 The search was an unprecedented illegal investigation in violation of Japan constitution and criminal procedure code as well as international law, and an unpardonable human rights abuse and discrimination against the Korean nationals in Japan.
					
					 We bitterly condemn the Japanese authorities for their brigandish suppression of Chongryon.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted by British Body on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted by British Body on Its Website
						
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- The full text of leader Kim Jong Il's work "Kimilsungia Is an Immortal Flower Blooming in the Hearts of Humankind in the Era of Independence" was posted by the Korean Friendship Association UK on its website on Mar. 26.
					 The work, published on April 6, Juche 94 (2005), deals with the historic status of Kimilsungia and significance of its cultivation, indicating tasks to be fulfilled to bring the flower of the sun, a treasure common to mankind, into full bloom everywhere in the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Letter Posted by Organization of DR Congo on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Letter Posted by Organization of DR Congo on Its Website 
						
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- The full text of "Let Us Usher In a New Heyday of Building a Sports Power in the Revolutionary Spirit of Paektu", a letter sent by Marshal Kim Jong Un to those attending the 7th National Conference of Sportspeople, was posted by the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of DR Congo on its website on April 1.
					 The work, published on Mar. 25, Juche 104 (2015), deals with the fact that the Workers' Party of Korea is channeling great efforts into the sports field in order to develop the nation's sports true to President Kim Il Sung's and leader Kim Jong Il's Juche-based idea and intention of developing sports.
					
					 It also clarifies the tasks and ways of successfully implementing the party's plan for building a sports power.

articles.title: Regional Body Slams U.S. Anti-DPRK "Human Rights" Campaign
articles.content:
Regional Body Slams U.S. Anti-DPRK "Human Rights" Campaign
						
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- The Afro-Asian People's Solidarity Organization released a statement on Apr. 1 in denunciation of the anti-DPRK "human rights" racket being kicked up by the U.S. and its allies.
					 Recalling that the U.S. and its allies perpetrated such an act hostile to the DPRK as ramming an anti-DPRK "human rights resolution" through the 28th session of the UN Human Rights Council despite the opposition of the progressive countries in the world calling for ensuring genuine human rights and establishing a fair international order, the statement said:
					
					 It has already been fully exposed to the world that the "human rights issue" in the DPRK which was cooked up by the U.S. lackeys wearing the mask of "protecting human rights" on the basis of the "testimonies" made by "defectors from the north", human scum bereft of elementary human qualities and conscience, and has been noisily advertised by the U.S. and other Western countries was no more than a fabrication.
					
					 The AAPSO categorically rejects the anti-DPRK "human rights resolution".
					
					 The U.S. should no longer interfere in the internal affairs of other countries, styling itself a "human rights judge", but set right its own human rights situation as it is being censured as the world's worst human rights tundra.
					
					 Japan and some countries of EU should not impudently behave, pursuant to the U.S. scenario, but improve their tarnished image in the eyes of the international community.

articles.title: Russian Personages Demand Stop to U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drills
articles.content:
Russian Personages Demand Stop to U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drills
						
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- The first secretary of the Partizansk City Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, the chairman of the Slav Association and other Russian personages sent a letter to the U.S. president on March 27 in protest against the U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises targeting the DPRK.
					 The letter said:
					
					 Members of political parties and organizations in Partizansk City, maritime territory of Russia and its citizens demand a stop to military drills sparking off conflict and provocation on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 There has not been a peaceful day on the peninsula for seven decades since 1945.
					
					 The U.S. triggered off military conflict in the western border of Russia and now seeks to cause one in the eastern border.
					
					 Why does the U.S. always want blood and war? What does the U.S. want?
					
					 Why does the U.S. compel the DPRK to channel bigger efforts into defence field?
					
					 If the DPRK had failed to get it fully ready to cope with the U.S. aggression, it would have faced the same fate as Iraq and Libya.
					
					 We urge the U.S. to accept the proposal of the DPRK that in case the former suspends joint military drills in south Korea and its vicinity, the latter has the willingness to take such measure as putting a moratorium on nuclear tests.

articles.title: Iniciada exposicion fotografica nacional
articles.content:
Tiene lugar seminario de funcionarios y miembros de FGSC
						
Pyongyang, 7 de abril (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 7 en la Casa Central de Obreros el seminario de los funcionarios y miembros de la Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea sobre las proezas revolucionarias del Songun del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, con motivo del 22o aniversario de su eleccion como Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					Los oradores dijeron que practicando la original politica de Songun, el Dirigente defendio la patria socialista del Juche y realizo grandes hazanas ante la epoca, la revolucion, la patria y el pueblo. 
					
					Bajo su orientacion, el Ejercito Popular de Corea se ha fortalecido como vanguardia que considera como vida la defensa a ultranza al lider y materializa a riesgo de la vida la orden del Comandante Supremo, apuntaron.
					
					Se hizo -prosiguieron- fuerzas armadas revolucionarias del monte Paektu equipadas con armas modernas y grueso del cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Songun. 
					
					Destacaron que el Dirigente hizo aprobar la Constitucion Kim Il Sung que estipula por la ley la autoctona idea y hazanas del Presidente en materia de la construccion del Estado y establecer el sistema de direccion del Estado centrado en el Comite de Defensa Nacional, de modo que se lograra victoria en la defensa del socialismo y la confrontacion antiimperialista y antiyanqui. 
					
					Llamaron a tomar como linea de vida los legados del Dirigente y contribuir a adelantar la victoria final de la causa revolucionaria del Juche bajo la direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Tiene lugar seminario de funcionarios y miembros de FGSC
articles.content:
Acto de UMDC dedicado al dia de eleccion de Kim Jong Il como Presidente del CDN
						
Pyongyang, 7 de abril (ACNC) -- Las funcionarias y las gremiales de la Union de Mujeres Democraticas de Corea organizaron el dia 7 en la Casa de la Mujer la audicion de nobles virtudes del Dirigente Kim Jong Il con motivo del 22o aniversario de su eleccion como Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC (9 de abril).
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes el secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Choe Ryong Hae, la presidenta del CC de la UMDC, Kim Jong Sun, y otras funcionarias y gremiales de la organizacion femenina en esta capital.
					
					Las oradoras enfatizaron que la eleccion del Dirigente como Presidente del CDN fue acontecimiento historico en el avance victorioso de la causa revolucionaria del Juche, la del Songun, iniciada en el monte Paektu y en la lucha por construir un Estado prospero.
					
					Mencionaron que el Dirigente inspecciono la Division Guardia de Tanques 105 "Seul" Ryu Kyong Su del Ejercito Popular de Corea el 25 de agosto del 49 (1960) de la Era Juche y este suceso significo la declaracion de su ferrea conviccion y voluntad de continuar las nobles tradiciones de la revolucion coreana, iniciada y avanzada con el fusil, siendo el anuncio del comienzo de su direccion sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun.
					
					Se refirieron a que el dedico todo lo suyo al fortalecimiento de las fuerzas militares y la construccion de una patria prospera visitando sin parar las unidades del EPC, las fabricas, las empresas y las granjas cooperativas de varias ramas de la economia nacional
					
					Las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias de Corea hacen galas de su aspecto de ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu porque tienen al Mariscal Kim Jong Un, identico al Dirigente, en el cargo supremo del Partido, el Estado y el ejercito, finalizaron.

articles.title: Acto de UMDC dedicado al dia de eleccion de Kim Jong Il como Presidente del CDN
articles.content:
Trabajadores agricolas conmemoran dia de eleccion de Kim Jong Il como Presidente de CDN
						
Sariwon, 7 de abril (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 22o aniversario de la eleccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il como Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, tuvo lugar el dia 7 en la Granja Cooperativa de Migok de la ciudad de Sariwon de la provincia de Hwanghae del Norte el recital de poesias y canciones de los trabajadores agricolas "General Insigne del Songun y llanura de la cooperativa socialista". 
					Participaron en la ocasion el presidente del CC de la Union de Trabajadores Agricolas de Corea (UTAC), Ri Myong Gil, y los funcionarios interesados, los trabajadores agricolas de la ciudad de Sariwon y la granja mencionada.
					
					En la poesia y coro "La fuerza de Corea" y otras piezas, los ejecutantes elogiaron la vida brillante del Dirigente quien durante largo tiempo, acumulo hazanas inmortales ante la epoca y la revolucion con su destacada idea y gran capacidad ejecutiva de la revolucion.
					
					Se interpretaron tambien la cancion en serie "Mar de manzanas al pie del monte Chol", el solo masculino "Nuestro Mariscal", la poesia y coro "Adelante hacia la victoria final", "Defenderemos a costa de la vida al General Kim Jong Un", etc.

articles.title: Trabajadores agricolas conmemoran dia de eleccion de Kim Jong Il como Presidente de CDN
articles.content:
Tiene lugar mitin festivo de tripulantes extranjeros 
Chongjin, 7 de abril (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 22o aniversario de la eleccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il como Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, tuvo lugar este martes en el Puerto de Chongjin el mitin festivo de los marineros extranjeros con la participacion del capitan y tripulantes del barco "YUAN-7" de nacionalidad de Sierra Leona.
					Los participantes depositaron cestos de flores ante las estatuas de bronce del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il erguidas altamente en la ciudad de Chongjin y les rindieron el homenaje.
					
					En la ocasion hubo discursos. 
					
					Los oradores recordaron que el Dirigente realizo incansables esfuerzos hasta el ultimo momento de su vida por consolidar el poderio militar de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					
					Prosiguieron que el frustro las brutales maniobras de agresion de los imperialistas dando prioridad a los asuntos militares y convirtio la RPDC en el digno pais portador de armas nucleares y el fabricante y lanzador de satelite artificial. 
					
					Apuntaron que gracias a la capacidad politica, la genial inteligencia militar, la audacia y el arte de mando militar del Dirigente, la RPDC se hizo potencia militar de talla mundial y agregaron que seran eternas sus grandes hazanas realizadas ante la epoca y la historia.
					
					En la ocasion fue aprobada una carta dirigida al Mariscal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Tiene lugar mitin festivo de tripulantes extranjeros
articles.content:
Efectuado en RPDC acto dedicado al Dia Mundial de Salud
						
Pyongyang, 7 de abril (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 7 en el capitalino Palacio Cultural del Pueblo el acto dedicado al Dia Mundial de Salud.
					En la ocasion participaron los funcionarios de la salud publica, los ministerios, organos centrales, entidades sociales y la prensa, el representante de la Organizacion Mundial de la Salud (OMS) y los miembros de las representaciones de organizaciones internacionales en Corea, los representantes diplomaticos y miembros de las embajadas de varios paises acreditados en Corea.
					
					En el acto, los oradores mencionaron que la OMS presento como tema de este ano la seguridad de alimentos y preparo asi la oportunidad de prevenir las enfermedades causadas por los alimentos y contribuir al fomento de salud de la humanidad.
					
					Exhortaron a contribuir a la salud de la gente al intensificar la propaganda sobre los conocimientos higienicos a tomar en cuenta en la produccion, la conservacion y el consumo de los alimentos.
					
					Los participantes vieron un video referente a los alimentos seguros y recorrieron los alimentos exhibidos.
					
					Este dia, se llevaron a cabo en todas las provincias la propaganda intensiva de higiene, con motivo del Dia Mundial de Salud.

articles.title: Efectuado en RPDC acto dedicado al Dia Mundial de Salud
articles.content:
Iniciada exposicion fotografica nacional 
Pyongyang, 7 de abril (ACNC) -- Quedo inaugurada la exposicion fotografica nacional "Padre del pueblo" en ocasion del 3o aniversario de la eleccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un en el cargo supremo del partido y el Estado. 
					En la sede se ven las fotos alusivas a las cualidades de gran hombre del Mariscal. 
					
					"Comandante Supremo Kim Jong Un inspeccionando la Division Guardia de Tanques 105 Seul Ryu Kyong Su del Ejercito Popular de Corea", "Comandante Supremo Kim Jong Un tomando foto de recuerdo con los soldados defensores de Phanmunjom" y otras fotos reflejan los esfuerzos patrioticos y abnegados del Mariscal quien defiende con firmeza la soberania del pais y la dignidad de la nacion emprendiendo sin parar el camino del Songun.
					
					"Kim Jong Un recorriendo las viviendas para educadores de la Universidad Politecnica Kim Chaek", "Kim Jong Un subiendo en teleferico a la cumbre del campo de esqui del monte Masik para averiguar la seguridad y la comodidad", etc. muestran los rasgos populares de el quien continua el noble proposito de los lideres antecesores que consideraban al pueblo como el cielo. 
					
					Tambien se exhiben las fotos que describen el aspecto de los militares y civiles coreanos, quienes gozan de una vida digna, y la realidad maravillosa de la patria. 
					
					La ceremonia de apertura tuvo lugar el dia 7 en el capitalino Palacio Cultural del Pueblo con la participacion del secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Choe Thae Bok, otros funcionarios y trabajadores capitalinos. 
					
					El ministro de Cultura, Pak Chun Nam, pronuncio un discurso de la ocasion.

articles.title: Tiene lugar encuentro de cine con motivo de 50o aniversario de visita de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il a Indonesia
articles.content:
Tiene lugar encuentro de cine con motivo de 50o aniversario de visita de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il a Indonesia
						
Pyongyang, 7 de abril (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 7 en el Cine Taedongmun el encuentro de cine dedicado al 50o aniversario de la visita del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il a Indonesia. 
					Asistieron a la ocasion la presidenta del Comite de Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero, Kim Jong Suk, el vicepresidente de la misma entidad y presidente de la Asociacion de Amistad Corea-Indonesia, So Ho Won, trabajadores capitalinos, el embajador Bambang Hiendrasto y otros miembros de la sede diplomatica indonesia en Corea. 
					
					Fueron invitados los representantes diplomaticos y los miembros de las embajadas de varios paises en Corea. 
					
					Los oradores dijeron que la visita de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il a Indonesia sirvio de motivo historico porque sento la piedra angular del desarrollo de relaciones entre ambos paises.
					
					Recordaron que en aquel entonces, el presidente indonesio Sukarno puso a esa flor hermosa y preciosa el nombre respetable del gran hombre sin igual. Subrayaron que con el documental a proyectarse en la ocasion los participantes conoceran mas bien sobre las imperecederas hazanas de los grandes lideres coreanos acumuladas para el cumplimiento de la causa de independencia de la humanidad. 
					
					Expresaron la voluntad de seguir amplificando y desarrollando multilateralmente las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre Corea e Indonesia, preparadas por los grandes lideres coreanos y el presidente Sukarno.
					
					Luego, los participantes vieron la primera parte del documental coreano "Encuentros del Presidente Kim Il Sung con jefes de Estado y personalidades renombradas del extranjero".
